title: The Stuff (1985) DVDRip XVID- FrodoBagginz
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090094/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090094/</a>

Weird yummy goo erupts from the earth and is discovered by a couple of miners. They taste it and decide to market it because it tastes so good. The American public literally eats up the new dessert sensation now known as the Stuff but, unfortunately, it takes over the brains of those who eat it, turning them into zombie-like creatures. It is up to ex-FBI agent David Rutherford and a kid named Jason to stop the spread of the mind-devouring dessert

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am a beginner ripper so I did the best I could. I have included 2 audio tracks....English and Directors Audio Commentary. To access the audio commentary just select track 2 in the audio options of VLC. Not sure how to select the 2nd track in other media players but I assume they have similar options.

Video seems in sync with audio. It might be a LITTLE out of sync maybe but nothing that will bother you. Tested both audio tracks in VLC and they work.
